testcase.name: validate the response that is returned using xpath validation for tags/values
testcase.system-out: * def CommonMethod = Java.type('ReusableMethod.utility') .................. passed * def Rand = new CommonMethod() ........................................... passed * def DateObject = call read('classpath:ReusableMethod/ReusableFeatureFunctions.feature') . passed * def date = DateObject.CurrentDate_YYYYMMDD() ............................ passed * def Last4Digit = Rand.generateRandomValue(4); ........................... passed * def MsgId = '021/DDINP/Puleng/' + date + "/" + Last4Digit ............... passed * print 'The Message ID is: ', MsgId ...................................... passed * def xmlPayload = read('classpath:payload/payload.xml') .................. passed * print 'The payload is: ', xmlPayload .................................... passed Given url baseURl ......................................................... passed And path baseURLpath ...................................................... passed And request xmlPayload .................................................... passed When method POST .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed * def payloadResponse = response .......................................... passed * call read('classpath:payloadValidation/FileValidation.feature') ......... passed
